feed.title: LANCommander Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.1.2
entry.content:
Server

  • Fixed failure to save new games with populated tags/genres/collections
  • Script editing form is now validated before saving (blocks script creation if name is not set)
  • Autofocus game metadata lookup when creating new game
  • Autofocus various form fields across application
  • Added new script type for servers to execute on related game start/stop
  • Various fixes to first time setup
  • Fixed downloading of launcher artifacts
  • Fixed sorting of servers
  • Fixed updating of media path in settings
  • Fixed archive downloading endpoints for games, redistributables, and saves
  • Fixed server start/stop and process tracking
  • Fixed application start autostart servers from preventing the rest of the application to start
  • Set default cookie policy on first time setup
  • Fixed datatable searches not working on first search
  • Defined storage locations are now ensured to be created on start
  • Fixed first time setup for MySQL/MariaDB
  • Fixed missing screenshot on login/registration error

Launcher

  • Added autofocus for authentication forms
  • Added autofocus to title search in depot
  • Fixed potential double listing of games in depot

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.1.3
entry.content:
Launcher

  • Only actions from installed games/mods are now displayed
  • Fixed games not starting and overloading server with start/stop requests
  • Fixed downloading of avatars using Out-PlayerAvatar

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.1.4
entry.content:
Server

  • Fix starting game servers
  • Fix potential page error when editing servers with no consoles defined
  • Added artifact type to launcher download popup

Launcher

  • Fixed crash on logout
  • Added "Browse Depot" button when library is empty

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.1.5
entry.content:
Server

  • Fixed an issue where the IPX relay would cause high CPU usage if started/stopped multiple times (#200)
  • Fixed the autostart of the IPX relay (#188)
  • Fixed save uploading (#190)
  • Settings / Scripts are now saved properly (#194)
  • Game servers will now be more responsive when using the start/stop control buttons (#198)
  • Fixed importing of companies when importing metadata from IGDB (#201)
  • Fixed importing of games from local files (#203)
  • Fixed first time setup creation of administrator user (#206)
  • Added graceful error handling for Depot (#210)
  • Added additional paths to first time setup
  • Fixed error when adding media (#216)
  • Fixed update of tables on various entities (#218, #224)
  • Updated Dockerfile to be based off Microsoft's official .NET base Docker images
  • Administrator step is skipped on first time setup if one already exists
  • Fixed user custom fields not being shown when editing a user
  • Moved the "Restrict Games By Collection" switch to Settings / Library
  • Users datatable is now searchable
  • Fixed logging on IPX relay if enabled
  • Fixed some areas where the Created By and Created On fields were not getting populated
  • Added API menu item to Settings for OpenAPI/Scalar integration
  • Reworked downloading of launcher artifacts from GitHub (note, this is still iffy. It's hard to test this until releases are actually posted. Downloading launchers for nightlies is still a WIP)
  • Times are now rendered as local time based on the user's browser locale.

Launcher

  • New: The server address field will now also try other possible valid URLs if the address input is invalid or incomplete. See #208 for more details
  • Fixed: The "Manage Saves" dialog no longer crashes when opened (#207)
  • The library list will now display a button to clear the filter instead of the "Browse Depot" button (#193)
  • Fixed "Register" button (#214)
  • Rebuilt save packing to be more reliable

Nightlies

Nightly builds of both the launcher and server are now being hosted on GitHub under action runs. Docker builds are also being pushed to GitHub Packages. As all nightlies go, these are unstable builds and may not work as expected.

Breaking Changes

The mounting paths for the Docker container have changed in v1.1.5. Directories that were in /config now live at /app/config. Please update your bindings accordingly.

WinGet Packages

LANCommander is now available to install via WinGet! These packages are included in our CI, so releases will get automatically pushed to the public Microsoft source.

New Contributors

  • @simonmarklar made their first contribution in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/192
  • @eliaswen made their first contribution in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/202
  • @PGHJA991id12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/222

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.1.4...v1.1.5

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v1.1.6
entry.content:
Server

  • Added experimental support for controlling servers hosted via Docker containers
  • Fixed error that may occur when updating the database from an older version to 1.1.x
  • Fixed issue that would cause the server start/stop control to kill the entire page
  • Fixed launcher download from login page (thanks @RattleSN4K3!)
  • Fixed issue that would cause the beacon to crash when multiple launchers are attempting to locate the server at the same time
  • Fixed issue that would cause the beacon to block depot results
  • Fix Blazor rejoin dialog font color being white, force to black by @RattleSN4K3
  • Fix Media Manual preview thumbnail and PDF viewer. by @RattleSN4K3 in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/252
  • Fix import multiplayer modes by @RattleSN4K3 in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/247
  • Block First-Time-Setup after its initial setup being done by @RattleSN4K3 in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/246
  • Fix Media.Type Select not updating by @RattleSN4K3 in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/251
  • Thumbnail file/image size reduction by @RattleSN4K3 in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/248
  • Punctuation is now stripped from searches in datatables
  • Fix some cases where local time rendering failed
  • Fix default role saving
  • Fix accessing Redistributable page crashing for non existing item vt @RattleSN4K3 inhttps://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/255

Launcher

  • Fix Launcher register error by @RattleSN4K3 in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/243
  • Fix issue where games with titles ending in . could not be installed

Other Updates

  • Updated some links in the WinGet manifest
  • Nightly builds now generate a pre-release in GitHub accessible from Releases

New Contributors

  • @RattleSN4K3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/pull/241

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v1.1.5...v1.1.6
